body.name: Tiege Hanley Daily Mens Face Wash - Gentle Fragrance-Free Facial Cleanser for Men Gently Removes Dirt, Grime & Excess Oil - Cleansing Facewash for Dry or Sensitive Skin - Skin Care for Men, 6.5 Ounces
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 5% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 mins
features: High-Quality Facial Cleanser for Men: The Tiege Hanley WASH is a facial cleanser that rinses away oil and dirt to expose clean, healthy, and handsome skin. Our daily facial cleanser is enriched with natural ingredients making it safe for all skin types. 6.5oz

Experience Softer, Smoother Skin: Use WASH to help fight breakouts, improve pH levels, and deeply cleanse your skin. This product can help your skin appear smoother, feel softer, and look healthier with only a small amount. WASH also helps decrease shine, lessening the appearance of greasy skin, and helps keep overall oil production under control.

Perfect for Sensitive Skin: WASH is specially formulated to provide a refreshing and cleansing experience all while being fragrance-free. It’s safe to use twice a day and won’t dry out skin thanks to the combination of soothing ingredients like cucumber extract and eucalyptus oil.

How to Use: First, rinse your face with some warm water. Then squeeze a nickel-size amount of WASH onto your fingers. Briefly rub your hands together to spread it out, then gently apply it all over your face for 10-15 seconds, avoiding your eyes and mouth. After cleansing, rinse off with more water. Use once in the morning and at night.

A Simplified Skin Care Routine: Our philosophy at Tiege Hanley is to develop routines that include the fewest number of products and take the least amount of time possible. Simple. Speedy. Successful. You should have no doubt about what you’re using and what it’s doing.

productInformation.value: #15,243 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #243 in Facial Cleansing Washes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are these products fragrance-free? A majority of our products are fragrance-free. The light scents in PM, AM, and WASH come from the ingredients, primarily natural extracts that dissipate quickly. Are your products vegan and cruelty-free? Our products are cruelty-free. One of the waxes we use in our AM/PM moisturizers is made from beeswax, so our products aren’t completely vegan. How do I incorporate Tiege Hanley into my shaving routine? We recommend using WASH first, then shaving. If it's a day that you are exfoliating, you would WASH, SCRUB and then shave. Moisturizer should be applied after you shave. If you use aftershave, you can use our AM moisturizer in its place. How should I apply Tiege Hanley if I have a beard? Full bearded guys should apply Tiege Hanley to the exposed areas of the face and neck only. Guys with stubble/light beards can apply our products through their facial hair on the entire face and neck. Why doesn't WASH create a lot of foam? Our WASH is designed to be gentle and contains very low concentrations of surfactants to keep skin hydrated after cleansing. Foaming in a cleanser only means there are lots of surfactants and does not equate to cleaning the skin."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing face wash
reviews.reviewText: I've generally considered my skin to be fine, but I have the occasional dry skin and now some subtle wrinkles. I've generally avoided face cleaners and moisturizers because I never know what to buy, and when I have tried them, there is often a fragrance that makes my nose stuffy. A friend recommended I try Tiege Hanley so I bought the face wash. I also bought the AM moisturizer, PM moisturizer, and exfoliating scrub. The shipping estimate was something like a week or two, but the products arrived just two days after I ordered them. The products also came with simple to follow instructions. No confusion here. I know exactly what I need to do. Takes me a minute in the morning and a minute at night. I only use a small amount of the face wash in the morning and at night. It's got a very refreshing feeling and it's not drying my skin. Fragrance is kept to a minimum as well. Just a good clean wash you can't get with soap or some other products. I apply a dab of the moisturizer after the face wash and I'm done. I'm very happy with the product. I never thought I would have a skin care routine, let alone as simple as this. Finally I have something that works. Thanks Tiege for putting together a great product and making it easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have the subscription straight from the site. I’ve had it ever since the company launched, and I’ve always been so amazingly impressed! Every single product is the best I’ve ever had, and I will NEVER get any other facial care products! I feel so strongly, when I forgot my toiletries bag on a recent trip out of state, before the plane had even taken off I had already ordered the wash to be sent to where I was going! Then gifted the rest to my friend lol if you’re looking for a great wash, or are getting into skin care, this is the perfect wash to start and end with! But definitely go to the website and check out the whole system! It’s worth it!

reviews.reviewText: Smells good not worth the price. Burns a little, I guess it's working as directed follow instructions. Taking time thought...

Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not smell as good and it is thick
reviews.reviewText: Make my skin a bit softer but it doesn't smell as good. They can definitely invest in a better scent and for some reason it is think in the consistency, what makes it harder to rub on your face since it gets stuck on your fingers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean your face!
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. Was great to find a large tube of it. Has no smell.
Still works greatConsistency is thicker than originalDon’t let it get in your eyes….it burns!

reviews.reviewTitle: Burns the eyes, and not a great cleaner
reviews.reviewText: I've used other men's skin care product. Thought I'd try this out as reviews were mostly positive. While it cleans adequately, it does irritate the eyes if any gets in while rinsing. Other products don't cause me this issue. Overaly unimpressed respective of the high cost of this product. WIll not be purchasing again.
